item.title: Premium Item Wear Help [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“King Lingerz, post:12, topic:322389”]What happened to “We are an informative, not a mis-informative community”…?

You can’t have a ‘break’ without ‘case’ or ‘default’, and you can’t have ‘case’/‘default’ without opening a switch statement, which you never did. At least not in the code provided.

Judging by your first attempt I suggest you read up on simple Java.

The provided code fixed up:

if (wearID == 15185 || wearID == 5553 || wearID == 5555 || wearID == 6629 || wearID == 15352) { if (premiumStatus != 1){ sM("This item is available for premium users only!"); } }[/quote]

Yeah, tried that too but it doesn’t work. It makes it so when you are non prem and you wear an item non prem, you can’t wear it lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Premium Item Wear Help [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

What happened to “We are an informative, not a mis-informative community”…?

You can’t have a ‘break’ without ‘case’ or ‘default’, and you can’t have ‘case’/‘default’ without opening a switch statement, which you never did. At least not in the code provided.

Judging by your first attempt I suggest you read up on simple Java.

The provided code fixed up:

if (wearID == 15185 || wearID == 5553 || wearID == 5555 || wearID == 6629 || wearID == 15352) { if (premiumStatus != 1){ sM("This item is available for premium users only!"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Premium Item Wear Help [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“licorish55, post:4, topic:322389”]Not JUST an else statement…
Here is an example.

case 32://King Black Dragon
if (p.jailed == (0)) { <This being the Else Statements base basically.
p.teleportTo(2260, 4701, 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1678, 0, 1679, 0);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “<col=67001C>You have teleported to kbd area! Watch out!”);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “<col=67001C>Good Luck!”);
} else { <Now, if there Jailed == (1))… Below is what happens.
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You can’t teleport while in jail.”);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Next time be more careful!”);
}
break;

I’m saying you need to add the else statement to tell it what to do.

If im not making sense it’s because it’s late lol.[/quote]

I know… I tried that too. Didn’t worké

Read full topic

p.frames.sendMessage(p, “<col=67001C>You have teleported to kbd area! Watch out!”);

p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You can’t teleport while in jail.”);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Next time be more careful!”);
}
break;

I’m saying you need to add the else statement to tell it what to do.

If im not making sense it’s because it’s late lol.

item.title: Premium Item Wear Help [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

I added premium member in my server. I added that in case 41:

if(wearID == 15185 || wearID == 5553 || wearID == 5555 || wearID == 6629 || wearID == 15352); if(premiumStatus != 1){ sM("This item is available for premium users only!"); // Premium Items break; }

The problem is when I log on, non premium can’t wear anything. Can anyone help me and fix that? So premium can wear the ids showed with all others items but non premium can’t wear the ids showed but can wear all the other.

Thanks.

Read full topic
